meta.title: RedCat Multiverse
meta.twitterDescription: To begin your adventures in the RedCat Multiverse, you’ll need at least six character NFTs, which Inception NFTs provide – along with other exciting in-game perks.
meta.twitterTitle: RCM's Inception NFTs multiply into six (or more) character NFTs and more.

cta.second: Limited Inception Minting Party is Coming Soon!
cta.third: To get a chance to whitelist for the Inception Collection NFTs
